question: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) has signed a MoU with which foundation to telecast e-learning content for school children?
explanation:
National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) has digitally signed a MoU with Rotary India to telecast e-learning content for school children.
The Union HRD Minister Ramesh Pokhariyal Nishank was present during the event. The learning content is to be telecasted in all NCERT TV channels for class 1-12. Under the ‘Vidya Daan 2.0’ programme, Rotary International will provide the e - content in Hindi language to NCERT. Material for special children and Adult Literacy Mission will also be provided.
